mapper.update:
update t_wallt_detail
hash = #{hash,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
number = #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
wallet_id = #{walletId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
from_address = #{fromAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
to_address = #{toAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
money = #{money,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fee = #{fee,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
block = #{block,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
transaction_date = #{transactionDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER},
activated = #{activated,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where detail_id = #{detailId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_wallt_detail set hash = #{hash,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, number = #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wallet_id = #{walletId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, from_address = #{fromAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, to_address = #{toAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, money = #{money,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fee = #{fee,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, block = #{block,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, transaction_date = #{transactionDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, activated = #{activated,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where detail_id = #{detailId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_wallt_detail WHERE wallet_id = #{walletId} ORDER BY create_date DESC LIMIT #{limit}
SELECT * FROM t_wallt_detail wd WHERE wallet_id = #{params.walletId} order by create_date desc limit #{startNum},#{pageSize}
SELECT count(*) FROM t_wallt_detail wd WHERE wallet_id = #{params.walletId}
SELECT DISTINCT (LEFT(wd.create_date, 7)) AS yearMonth FROM ( SELECT * FROM t_wallt_detail WHERE wallet_id = #{params.walletId} ORDER BY create_date DESC LIMIT #{startNum}, #{pageSize} ) wd
SELECT * FROM t_wallt_detail WHERE LEFT (create_date, 7) = #{yearMonth} ORDER BY create_date DESC LIMIT #{limit}

SELECT count(*) FROM t_user u INNER JOIN t_wallet w ON u.user_id = w.user_id AND u.user_id = #{params.userId} and u.deleted=1 INNER JOIN t_wallt_detail wd on wd.wallet_id=w.wallet_id
and w.type=#{params.walletType}
